DataSource.Name: Default

RichDescItem.Description:
Transaction Items Export Report

Abstract

“Transaction Items Export Report” will give you the Transactions log of the exported Items in a selected Location and Operating Area in a selected period at your choice.

Generating the report

Parameter Input
In generating the report, parameter input features intuitive interface.
Built-in wizards will help you quickly and easily create at your choice profile for your site by
 
  • [From date – To Date] – Period to be analysed, easy-to-select.
    • Note: The dates if not specified are to be considered “Fiscal Date”
  • [Location] – Site Location Name, easy-to-select. Selecting -empty-, default is all the locations
  • [Operating Area] – Site Operating Area name, easy-to-select. Selecting -empty-, default is all the Operating Areas
  • [Entity Change ID] - Last Tracked Entity ID
Output File Extension
“Transaction Items Export Report” generates reports in XLSX or CSV or PDF formats. Selection is required before running the report.
  • XLSX
    • Report generates an EXCEL (latest version) file
  • CSV
    • its generation requires:
      • Field delimiter: Separator to be put between fields. Usually a "comma". When null, default is taken from user configuration.
      • Quote character: Character used to surround fields
      • Include header line to tick the box. Default is YES.
  • PDF
    • Report generates a PDF (latest version) file

Header

Report parameters:
  • [Execution date/time] -Report Execution Time. Date and Hours format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [From date – To Date] – Selected Period
  • [Location] – Site Location Name. If blank then the report includes all the locations.
  • [Attribute Code] –Attribute Code.
  • [Entity Changed] – Entity

Contents (by Columns)

The program produces easy-to-read reports that include text information.
  • [Type (T/i)] – Transaction Type (value "T" or "I")
  • [Transaction Date] – Transaction Fiscal Date. Display format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation] - Please note "Transaction Fiscal Date" could be different from "Transaction Sale Date"
  • [Transaction ime] – Transaction Time. Display format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [Sale Item ID] – Sale Item ID
  • [Transaction ID] – Transaction ID
  • [TDSSN] – Unique Transaction Serial Number, format “T:licence_number.workstation_number.YYDDMM.dailycounter”
  • [Sale Code (PNR)] - Reservation Number/PNR
  • [Location Code] – Site Location Code
  • [Location Name] – Site Location Name
  • [Operating Area Code] – Site Operating Area Code
  • [Operating Area Name] – Site Operating Area Name
  • [Workstation Code] – Workstation Code
  • [Workstation Name] – Workstation Name
  • [Account Username] – Account Username. Display format: “Last Name, First Name”.
  • [Account Username (email)] – Account Login Mail Address
  • [User] - Account Name. Display format: “Last Name, First Name”.
  • [Transaction Serial] - Daily Transaction Serial Number. Please note counter is reset every day
  • [Transaction Type Code] - Transaction Type Code #1 .. 100 (see LOOKUP TABLES >> Transaction Type)
  • [Transaction Type Label] - Transaction Type Description (see LOOKUP TABLES >> Transaction Type)
  • [Approved] - Transaction Approval Status. Display Format: “0 = FALSE” or “1 = TRUE”
  • [Paid] - Transaction Payment Status. Display Format: “0 = FALSE” or “1 = TRUE”
  • [Encoded] - Transaction Encoding Status. Display Format: “0 = FALSE” or “1 = TRUE”
  • [Printed] - Transaction Printing Status. Display Format: “0 = FALSE” or “1 = TRUE”
  • [Validated] - Transaction Validation Status. Display Format: “0 = FALSE” or “1 = TRUE”
  • [Product Code] – Product Code
  • [Product Name] – Product Name
  • [Quantity] – Quantity in unit #
  • [Unit Tax] - Tax per single item, in local currency
  • [Unit Amount] - Price per unit, in local currency
  • [Unit Attribute Amount] – Price per single Attribute, in local currency
  • [Total Tax] – Total Amount of Tax per Transaction, in local currency
  • [Total Due Amount] - Total Due Amount per Transaction, in local currency
  • [Paid Tax] – Total Amount of Paid Tax per Transaction, in local currency
  • [Paid Amount] – Total Paid Amount per Transaction, in local currency
  • [Print Group] Print Group
  • [Attribute Items] - Attribute Items. Display format: “attribute_item_name=value_in_local_currency | attribute_item_name=value_in_local_currency |”
  • [Tags] – TAG Name. Display format: “tag_name | tag_name | “
  • [Payments] - Payment Type and Values. Display format: “Type of payment=Value X | Type of payment=Value Y | Type of payment = Value Z|” - format “Type_Of_Payment=value_in_local_currency”
  • [REF-PNR] – REF-PNR. Display format “PNR = #”
  • [Entity Change Id] - Last Tracked Entity ID
